page.title: 11LIMERIGG DOG BREEDING 1
page.content: My name is Mairi Brown. I am nine years old. My mum,dad and I breed dogs. We have Labrador Retrievers and Pointers. If you have a bitch and you want to breed,you must find the best dog possible. After the bitch is mated,the puppies grow inside the mother's tummy for 63 days,before they are born. The mummy produces milk to feed her young until they can lap milk from a dish - usually in about 3 weeks. Puppies' eyes open in about 10 to 14 days and they are able to crawl at 2-3 weeks. You have to feed puppies 4 times a day,until they go to their new homes when they are 8 weeks old. Most people buy a puppy as a family pet,but a few buy a puppy for showing at dog shows. A dog must be taken to "Ring Craft" classes to learn how to stand and move properly.
